about_the_game:
That title makes this overview a bit redundant, but oh well!
Join three heroines on their way through the Holy Lands, a place filled with demons that are so horny that you have to sign a consent waiver before entering, to make your way to God and ask him a very important question. Why is the name of the game so long?

In this terribly difficult and erotic tactical roguelike you’ll be pushing and pulling demons of many different shapes and sizes all across the holy lands. Discover new friends, enemies, and abilities as you strategize your way on top, all while you lose over and over and over and over and over…

Game Features
  • Discover the secrets of the Holy Lands! A place full of different kinds of silly demons that are just itching for a chance to fu- I mean, defend God against intruders. Each demon can be caught and viewed in a bestiary.
  • Fight and F@*# your way through an endless horde of enemies. Use your skills and your body to unleash devastating combos, and to see some sexy artwork. A unique combat system where you try to zone enemies out of their effective ranges.
  • A little RNG to spice up your runs! In this game all your skills are random each run, master each skill on the fly and learn each enemy’s weakness to throw the RNG back into the face of the sadists that made this game.
  • Revive your heroines by using S.L.A.V.E tickets to deliver you back into battle, but this time in… uh… bondage gear… which makes you stronger!
  • Meet quirky characters. Unlock new shops, events, bosses and more by interacting with your new friends and foes.
  • Do you like weird synth-wave music? So do we, so we made some original catchy tunes and filled the game with them.
